changelog.title: AccessGuard Protection
changelog.description: Content pages now require proper authorization - no more bypassing the sorting hat!

changelog.title: Content Obfuscation System
changelog.description: Sensitive content encrypted at rest - decrypted only after authorization

changelog.title: House Landing Guards
changelog.description: All 8 house landing pages require completed sorting to access

changelog.title: Dark Arts Vault Security
changelog.description: The Vault now verifies completion of all Five Gates before entry
